column4: Hm, Ijust turned on my ubuntu box and the resolution is at like 640xsomething ... very large... it was working fine last time I was on it and I never modified the resolution. Any ideas? I try to change it and it only has 1 option. oh, it's 640x480. Any ideas.. .it has been working fine at 1280x1040 or whatever... and now it's not. hm
did you boot with your monitor switched off?
possibly, yeah. That makes a difference? I'll be darn.
